bookAuthors: Geoffrey Chaucer, Larry Dean Benson, F.N. Robinson
Plot: The most authentic edition of Chaucer's Complete Works available. - The fruit of years of scholarship by an international team of experts - A new foreword by Christopher Cannon introduces students to recent developments in Chaucer Studies - A detailed introduction covers Chaucer's life, works, language, and verse - Includes on-the-page glosses, explanatory notes, textual notes, bibliography, and a glossary
